__TOC__

* On Sunday 10th of October, we had a release party to celebrate Maverick Meerkat. We started off in Jimmy Chung's for a Chinese Buffet. Followed by a trip to the The Market Bar,. To add a bit if fun to the day we had a ubuntu quiz. Questions from the quiz are <nowiki>[[http://www.redbrick.dcu.ie/~tdr/blog/?p=39|here]]</nowiki>. A nice write up is <nowiki>[[http://www.lczajkowski.com/2010/10/10/compare-the-meerkat-at-the-market-bar-in-dublin-a-great-success/ |here]]</nowiki>. Photos <nowiki>[[http://pix.ie/ubuntuie/album/390376/ |here]]</nowiki>. And we had  <nowiki>[[http://www.lczajkowski.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/10/cake.jpg |cake]]</nowiki> :). 

* Regular <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/IrishTeam/IRCMeetings/2010-10-20|Monthly IRC Meeting]]</nowiki> was held at 8pm Irish time on Wednesday 20th October 2010.

* On Wednesday 27th of October the Dublin Ubuntu the <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/team/506/detail/| Dublin]]</nowiki> took place at the new time of 19:00 in the Trinity Capital Hotel.

* On Thursday 28th of October the <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/team/507/detail/| Limerick ]]</nowiki>Ubuntu Hour took place in the Absolute Hotel at 18:00.

* A member of our loco, czajkowski headed off to UDS-N
